pass by.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to go past a person, place, vehicle etc
pass by.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: They all waved as they passed by.
Will you be passing by the supermarket on your way home?
pass by.translation[0].definitions[1].de: if something passes you by, it happens but you are not involved in it
pass by.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: She felt that life was passing her by.
